rules_text:
When Cooking Class deals combat damage to a player Rejuvenate 2. [i](Exile two cards from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 2 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
{3}, {T}: Transform Cooking Class.
special_text:
[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
Create a 1/1 green Nopon creature token.
{1}{W}: Level 2
When this Class becomes level 2, you may create a token that's a copy of up to one target token you control. If you don't, you gain 3 life.
{2}{W}: Level 3
Transform Cooking Class.
rules_text2:
Vigilance
Whenever Nopon Chef attacks, you may create a token that's a copy of up to one target token you control. If you don't, you gain 3 life.
